messages.subject: I'm Back
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Dar: We ll get to California eventually (LOL).. Kino is the school that he s been going too.  Like I ve said it s wonderful in that it s an Unschooling
messages.messageBody:
Hi Dar:



We'll get to California eventually (LOL).. Kino is the school that he's
been going too. Like I've said it's wonderful in that it's an
Unschooling school so the kids don't have lessons or "have" to learn
anything at any particular time, but as Zak pointed out to me
"Everything I do at Kino, I can do at home and I miss you when I'm away
from you".. That was the deciding vote and the fact that it costs $640
per month.



On Wed, 22 Jan 2003 17:41:16 -0700 "Dawn Falbe"
<astrologerdawn@...> writes:

> I'm back from a hiatus of sending Zak to an alternative school. He

> went

> for a few months, and is finishing at the end of this month.



Welcome back!



What school was Zak at? I thought about Kino for a while, when Rain
wanted to go to school...



Dar





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: I'm Back
messages.msgSnippet: ... were gone! ... LOL!! Well distressing furniture is definitely a good substitute! I do that a lot. I m working on a headboard right now . I d better go
messages.messageBody:
--- In AlwaysLearning@y..., ddzimlew@j... wrote:
> Welcome back y'all!
>
>
> Meghan, I had this terrible urge to pierce something while you
were gone!
> But I distressed my table instead. <g> I told it it was ugly.
>
> Deb L

LOL!! Well distressing furniture is definitely a good substitute! I
do that a lot. I'm working on a headboard right now <g>.
I'd better go now. I'm about to be stabbed by a pirate and I'm
going to have to die now. Au Revoir.

Meghan

messages.subject: Re: I'm Back
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome back y all! Meghan, I had this terrible urge to pierce something while you were gone! But I distressed my table instead.    I told it it was ugly.
messages.messageBody:
Welcome back y'all!


Meghan, I had this terrible urge to pierce something while you were gone!
But I distressed my table instead. <g> I told it it was ugly.

Deb L
